timeline.bodyText:
this is a breaking change on a public class that is not marked @experimental.
why not keep init(DistributionConfig) and just make it call init(distributionConfig.toProperties()) ?
timeline.author: onichols-pivotal

replies.bodyText: The API break is necessary because the original was not a valid API since it leaked internal types. The case of two wrongs make a right.
replies.author: pivotal-jbarrett
